question:
you live in a room in college which you share with another student. however, there are many problems with this arrangements and you find it very difficult to work
write a letter to the accommodation officer at the college, in your letter,
- describe the situation
- explain your problem and why it is difficult to work
- say what kind of accommodation you would prefer
text: I am Ravi from the North block room and I am writing this letter to let you know that a few problems which I am facing my roommate as he is pushing me into hell every day with his late-night parties along with some huge noise audio systems as well.

As you know, I work from home daily due to ongoing Covid situations and need to take my client's calls late at night as well. But here the situation is not at all supportive to me to work and attend my client calls as my roommate is bringing his friends and celebrates fun parties every day without any break. Considering this situation, when should I do my office work? whom will my room rent if I stop working due to his disturbance?

I cannot bear him anymore and I strongly decided to shift my accommodation to a good community. Hence, I would request you to please do provide a good room without any issues and I am even ready to pay extra rent for the nice community room.
I look forward to hearing a response to my request and thank you very much for your understanding.
